snippet: A wide-ranging naval exercise focused on striking hypothetical unmanned aircraft and vessels in international waters to the south of the country.
abstract: Iranian naval forces fire surface-to-air missiles from ships in Strait of Hormuz, in drill meant to show country's ability to defend its territorial waters; tensions in area have been percolating over American-led campaign of international sanctions concerning Iran's disputed nuclear program, and Iran has threatened to close strait in retaliation.
lead_paragraph: A wide-ranging naval exercise focused on striking hypothetical unmanned aircraft and vessels in international waters to the south of the country.

headline.seo: Iran Fires Missiles in Wide-Ranging Naval Exercise
headline.main: Iran Tests New Version of Missiles in Exercise
headline.print_headline: Iran Tests New Version Of Missiles In Exercise
